godcards.name: Apollo
godcards.title: God Of Music
godcards.description: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.

godcards.name: Artemis
godcards.title: Goddess of the Hunt
godcards.description: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

godcards.name: Athena
godcards.title: Goddess of Wisdom
godcards.description: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.

godcards.name: Atlas
godcards.title: Titan Shouldering the Heavens
godcards.description: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.

godcards.name: Demeter
godcards.title: Goddess of the Harvest
godcards.description: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.

godcards.name: Hephaestus
godcards.title: God of Blacksmiths
godcards.description: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.

godcards.name: Minotaur
godcards.title: Bull-headed Monster
godcards.description: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.

godcards.name: Pan
godcards.title: God of the Wild
godcards.description: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.

godcards.name: Prometheus
godcards.title: Titan Benefactor of Mankind
godcards.description: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.

godcards.name: Ares
godcards.title: God of War
godcards.description: You may remove an unoccupied block (not dome) neighboring your unmoved Worker. You also remove any Tokens on the block

godcards.name: Chronus
godcards.title: God of Time
godcards.description: : You also win when there are at least five Complete Towers on the board.

godcards.name: Hestia
godcards.title: Goddess of Hear th and Home
godcards.description:
Your Worker may
build one additional time, but this
cannot be on a perimeter space.

godcards.name: Triton
godcards.title: God of the Waves
godcards.description: Each time your Worker moves into a perimeter space, it may immediately move again.

godcards.name: Zeus
godcards.title: God of the Sky
godcards.description: Your Worker may build a block under itself.
